Sport. Olympic Games 1928 Amsterdam, Netherlands. Demonstration game of korfball in Amsterdam. (What is korfball? I didn't know... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Korfball)
I think it's a kind of "Basketball" maybe it's just the name in dutch... "korf" may be the same in dutch like "Korb" in Germany (I am from there) We have a kind of "Basketball" that is called "Korbball". Hope I have taken a little bit of confusion! :-) By the way...If you search on wiki you should type it right ;-) for example: Type Korfball) and you get no result... type Korfball and you get this....http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Korfball
